trans-unit.source: Specifies operators for a conditional expression used in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 指定的条件表达式中使用的运算符<xref href="System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When using extending a class, member or indexer with a <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>, you may use a conditional expression to define how accessibility is verified.
trans-unit.target: 使用扩展类、 成员或具有索引器时<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>，你可以使用条件表达式来定义如何验证可访问性。</xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The left side of a conditional expression is the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A> and the right side is the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 条件表达式的左侧是<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>和右侧是<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the Equals operator is used, the left side must equal the right side of the conditional expression for the verification rule to report true.
trans-unit.target: 当使用等号运算符时，左侧必须等于右侧的验证规则才能报告为 true 的条件表达式。

trans-unit.source: When the NotEquals operator is used, the left side must not equal to the right side of the conditional expression for the verification rule to report true.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 NotEquals 运算符时，左侧必须不等于右侧的验证规则才能报告为 true 的条件表达式。
